parkingRobot

Interface IControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlRST

    public interface IControl
    interface for the main module 'Control', providing methods for executing the algorithms to control the robot according to different modes which is set by guidance.
    Author:
    RST

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IControl.ControlMode
      The predefined control modes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exec_CTRL_ALGO()
      execute the selected algorithms for control which was set by guidance
      IControl.ControlMode getCtrlMode()
      get the current control mode
      void setAngularVelocity(double angularVelocity)
      set the required angular velocity
      void setCtrlMode(IControl.ControlMode ctrl_mode)
      set the current control mode
      void setDestination(double heading, double x, double y)
      set the destination to be driven to
      void setDriveFor(double x, double y, double phi, double v, double w, Pose startPose)
      set RELATIVE destination and velocities before entering setpose-mode
      void setParkingData(Pose startPose, Pose endPose)
      set destination and calculate trajectory coefficients before parking-mode

      the Robot's current position

    • Method Detail

      • setVelocity

        void setVelocity(double velocity)
        set the required speed
        Parameters:
        velocity - the velocity of the robot to be set

      • setAngularVelocity

        void setAngularVelocity(double angularVelocity)
        set the required angular velocity
        Parameters:
        angularVelocity - the angular velocity to be set

      • setDestination

        void setDestination(double heading,
                    double x,
                    double y)
        set the destination to be driven to
        Parameters:
        heading - the heading angle of the robot at the destination
        x - the destination position in x axis
        y - the destination position in y axis

      • setPose

        void setPose(Pose currentPosition)
        the Robot's current position
        Parameters:
        currentPosition - the current position of the robot at each sampling

      • setDriveFor

        void setDriveFor(double x,
                 double y,
                 double phi,
                 double v,
                 double w,
                 Pose startPose)
        set RELATIVE destination and velocities before entering setpose-mode
        Parameters:
        x - the destination position in x axis in m
        y - the destination position in y axis in m
        phi - the heading angle of the robot at the destination in rad
        v - translatory velocity in cm//s
        w - angular velocity in rad/s
        startPose - latest measured pose

      • setParkingData

        void setParkingData(Pose startPose,
                    Pose endPose)
        set destination and calculate trajectory coefficients before parking-mode
        Parameters:
        startPose - latest measured pose
        endPose - finishing pose of parking process

      • setCtrlMode

        void setCtrlMode(IControl.ControlMode ctrl_mode)
        set the current control mode
        Parameters:
        ctrl_mode - parameter for control mode which is defined by Guidance

      • getCtrlMode

        IControl.ControlMode getCtrlMode()
        get the current control mode
        Returns:
        current ctrl_mode

      • setStartTime

        void setStartTime(int startTime)
        set start time
        Parameters:
        startTime - start time

      • exec_CTRL_ALGO

        void exec_CTRL_ALGO()
        execute the selected algorithms for control which was set by guidance
